titles.title: To amend title 18, United States Code, to prohibit interfering with voter registration, and for other purposes.
Alice Paul Voter Protection Act
Alice Paul Voter Protection Act
Alice Paul Voter Protection Act

action.text: Referred to the Committee on the Judiciary, and in addition to the Committee on House Administration, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.

Referred to the Subcommittee on Crime, Terrorism, and Homeland Security.
Referred to the Subcommittee on the Constitution, Civil Rights, and Civil Liberties.
